devdoc.details: An ONS registrar that allows the owner of a ONS name to claim the      corresponding name in ONS.

proveAndClaim(bytes,(bytes,bytes)[]).details: Submits proofs to the DNSSEC oracle, then claims a name using those proofs.

params.input: A chain of signed DNS RRSETs ending with a text record.
params.name: The name to claim, in DNS wire format.
